name: lightweight-music-server
description: LMS is a lightweight and fast self-hosted music streaming server with Last.fm scrobbling, playlist support, and web-based playback. It allows fully-private music streaming from your own server to any device.
features: Music Streaming: Web-based playback, Fast performance, Low resource usage. Lightweight music server.
Last.fm Integration: Scrobbling support, Music discovery, Listening history. Track what you listen to.
Playlist Management: Create playlists, Smart playlists, Queue management. Organize your music listening.
Multi-User: User accounts, Personal libraries, Access control. Share music with family.
